fields.title: alien dance party!!
fields.description: you just got ABDUCTED...but these martians-- with their glow-in-the-dark wristbands and necklaces... they want your help throwing a dance party??? put something you know these extraterrestial fellas would BOOGIE to!!

fields.title: bleeding out in the snow...
fields.description: heartbeat slows. cold's numbing. tragic. i should get up, but... im getting warmer, i think. yeah...

fields.title: liminal teenage angst
fields.description: you're 17, just got outta prom with your shitty girlfriend, you're chillin-- tryna not to go home but... man! what's this? a text from the homeboy chris?? abandoned mall??? he and carson finally found a way in???? cut to the memory of sitting at the edge of a food court, music playing towards the end of the dying speaker carson bought, and a shared cigarette. what song just happened to be the best song to play on that speaker?
